Welcome to OC-Lettings’s documentation!

This project is an exercice from Openclassrooms formation platform.

Forked from https://github.com/OpenClassrooms-Student-Center/Python-OC-Lettings-FR

Orange County Lettings web site is used to check lettings offers and user’s profiles.

Main Tools and packages

Django : Python framework to build the website backend with sqlite3 database Github : Code hosting plateform for version control based on git repositories Flake8 : Linting tool to check code based on PEP8 standard Docker : Containers allowing developers to work in standardized environments Sentry : Webtool to manage catched code’s exceptions and logs CircleCi : CI/CD pipeline tool Gunicorn : Python web server HTTP WSGI for Unix Heroku : Host server for running web app

    • Clone GitHub repository
